00029 FichierHDFPar::FichierHDFPar() :
00030   FichierHDF(), collective_op_(false)
00031 {
00032 #ifndef MPI_
00033   Cerr << "FichierHDFPar needs MPI to be used!" << finl;
00034   Process::exit(-1);
00035 #endif
00036 }
00037 
00038 FichierHDFPar::~FichierHDFPar() {}

00040 void FichierHDFPar::prepare_file_props()
00041 {
00042   FichierHDF::prepare_file_props();
00043 #ifdef MPI_
00044 
00045   MPI_Info infos;
00046   MPI_Info_create(&infos); //!< not used for now. CCRT supports advise to leave empty.
00047 
00048 #ifdef MED_
00049   H5Pset_fapl_mpio( file_access_plst_, Comm_Group_MPI::get_trio_u_world(), infos);
00050 
00051 // on cluster, type lfs getstripe . to see the default striping of the current repository
00052   hsize_t stripe_size = 1048576; //1572864;
00053   H5Pset_alignment(file_access_plst_, 0, stripe_size);
00054 #endif
00055 
00056   MPI_Info_free(&infos);
00057 #endif
00058 }
00059

00066     H5Pset_dxpl_mpio(dataset_transfer_plst_, H5FD_MPIO_COLLECTIVE);
00067 #endif
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 // int rank = Process::me();
00071 
00072 // //Build expected dataset name for the current proc (with the trailing _000x stuff)
00073 // Nom dataset_full_name = dataset_name;
00074 // dataset_full_name.nom_me(rank);
